name: November 2024 Core Update
description: Google released a broad core algorithm update affecting search rankings across multiple industries. The rollout completed on December 3, 2024.

name: October 2024 Core Update
description: A core algorithm update focusing on content quality and user experience. Sites with thin or low-quality content may have seen ranking changes.

name: August 2024 Core Update
description: Major core update affecting search rankings globally. Focus on rewarding helpful, people-first content.

name: June 2024 Spam Update
description: Spam-fighting update targeting manipulative link practices and low-quality content farms.

name: AI Overviews Launched
description: Google launched AI-generated summaries in search results, potentially affecting click-through rates for traditional organic results.

name: March 2024 Core Update
description: One of the largest core updates, with a 45-day rollout. Significant impact on content quality assessment and spam reduction.

name: November 2023 Reviews Update
description: Update targeting review content quality, promoting authentic first-hand reviews and demoting thin affiliate content.

name: November 2023 Core Update
description: Broad core algorithm update affecting multiple ranking signals and content assessment criteria.

name: October 2023 Core Update
description: Core update focusing on content relevance and quality signals.

name: October 2023 Spam Update
description: Spam update targeting manipulative practices and low-quality sites trying to game search rankings.

name: September 2023 Helpful Content Update
description: Update promoting content created for people rather than search engines. Sites with AI-generated thin content may have been affected.

name: August 2023 Core Update
description: Broad core update with focus on E-E-A-T (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness) signals.

name: March 2025 Core Update
description: Google announced a core algorithm update affecting broad ranking signals. The update completed rollout in two weeks.

name: June 2025 Core Update
description: Google began rolling out its June core update, focusing on content quality and user experience. The rollout took over two weeks to complete.

name: August 2025 Spam Update
description: Google launched the August spam update, targeting spam and manipulative practices in search results globally. The rollout took several weeks to finish.

name: Changes to Third-Party Rank Tracker Tools
description: Google has made changes to their Search Engine Results Pages which have affected most third-party rank tracker tools. As a result, GSC is now reporting significantly lower impressions for keywords ranked beyond position 20.
